wrap-up (draft).title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
Kaina of the Great Snow Sea
wrap-up (draft).text: The CG animation is good but not great, and the story is a bit generic, but the setting is very interesting and I enjoyed it.

wrap-up (draft).title: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten
wrap-up (draft).text: I generally enjoy contrived-premise romcoms but this one is genuinely great. Like sure, the setup is a bit silly, but that doesn't detract from some really great interactions and characterization.

wrap-up (draft).title: Blue Lock
wrap-up (draft).text: It's like a death game but instead of dying you just don't get to play pro soccer.
wrap-up (draft).line2: A silly, overdramatic, but still very good sports anime.

wrap-up (draft).title: In/Spectre s2
wrap-up (draft).line2: Better than the first season, but its strengths are still in its quirky protagonist and unusual take on what would otherwise be a boring detective show.

wrap-up (draft).title: D4DJ All Mix
wrap-up (draft).text: The decision to split the focus between all the units meant that none of the characters or dynamics got enough attention to really shine. Not nearly as good as the first season, imo.

wrap-up (draft).title: Trigun Stampede
wrap-up (draft).text: Orange once again demonstrates the potential of CG anime. I wouldn't rate it as high as Land of the Lustrous, but it's pretty darn good.
wrap-up (draft).line2: I wasn't a fan of the stormtrooper aim, bullets that do nothing unless the plot dictates it, and a few other minor gripes.

wrap-up (draft).title: Tsurune: The Linking Shot
wrap-up (draft).text: Actually one of the best sports anime. The first season was already good but I adored every episode of this season.

wrap-up (draft).title: High Card
wrap-up (draft).text: 52 cards, each granting the holder a unique power. Interesting premise, but somewhat generic execution.
wrap-up (draft).line2: It just didn't do anything special.

wrap-up (draft).title: Reborn to Master the Blade
wrap-up (draft).text: When I was looking for light novels with female protagonists this was on the bottom of many recommendation lists, and now I see why.
wrap-up (draft).line2: The characters are fine, but the story is a bit of a mess.

wrap-up (draft).title: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World
wrap-up (draft).text: It's... interesting enough, but not very good. Lots of bad CG, weird character arcs
